text: lokone te divasathi saceta kari do, jyare temani pase yatana avi pahoncase ane atyacari kahese ke he amara palanahara! Amane thodanka samayani mahetala apa jethi ame tari vatanum anusarana kari la'i'e ane tara payagambaronum pana anusarana karava lagi'e. Sum tame a pahela pana sogando nahata leta? Ke tamare duniya manthi kuca karavani ja nathi
